verses.verse: <S%G3588>This<s%> is a <S%G4103>true<s%> <S%G3056>saying,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G3713>desire<s%> the <S%G1984>office<s%> of a <S%G1984>bishop,<s%> he <S%G1937>desires<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G2041>work.<s%>

A <S%G1985>bishop<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> be <S%G423>blameless,<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G3524>vigilant,<s%> <S%G4998>sober,<s%> of good <S%G2887>behavior,<s%> given to <S%G5382>hospitality,<s%> <S%G1317>apt<s%> to <S%G1317>teach;<s%>

Not <S%G3943>given<s%> to <S%G3943>wine,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4131>striker,<s%> not <S%G866>greedy<s%> of filthy <S%G866>lucre;<s%> but <S%G1933>patient,<s%> not a <S%G269>brawler,<s%> not <S%G866>covetous;<s%>

One that <S%G4291>rules<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> his <S%G5043>children<s%> in <S%G5292>subjection<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4587>gravity;<s%>

(For <S%G1487>if<s%> a <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G1492>know<s%> not how to <S%G4291>rule<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>house,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> shall he take <S%G1959>care<s%> of the <S%G1577>church<s%> of <S%G2316>God?<s%>)

Not a <S%G3504>novice,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> being <S%G5187>lifted<s%> up with <S%G5187>pride<s%> he <S%G1706>fall<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2917>condemnation<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G1161>Moreover<s%> he <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G3141>report<s%> of them which are <S%G1855>without;<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> he fall <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3680>reproach<s%> and the <S%G3803>snare<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

<S%G5615>Likewise<s%> must the <S%G1249>deacons<s%> be <S%G4586>grave,<s%> not <S%G1351>double-tongued,<s%> not <S%G4337>given<s%> to <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3631>wine,<s%> not <S%G146>greedy<s%> of filthy <S%G146>lucre;<s%>

And let <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G1381>proved;<s%> <S%G1534>then<s%> let them use the <S%G1247>office<s%> of a <S%G1247>deacon,<s%> <S%G5607>being<s%> found <S%G410>blameless.<s%>
<S%G5615>Even<s%> <S%G5615>so<s%> must their <S%G1135>wives<s%> be <S%G4586>grave,<s%> not <S%G1228>slanderers,<s%> <S%G3524>sober,<s%> <S%G4103>faithful<s%> in <S%G3956>all<s%> things.

Let the <S%G1249>deacons<s%> be the <S%G435>husbands<s%> of <S%G3391>one<s%> <S%G1135>wife,<s%> <S%G4291>ruling<s%> their <S%G5043>children<s%> and their <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G3624>houses<s%> <S%G2573>well.<s%>

For they that have <S%G1247>used<s%> the <S%G1247>office<s%> of a <S%G1247>deacon<s%> <S%G2573>well<s%> <S%G4046>purchase<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> a <S%G2570>good<s%> <S%G898>degree,<s%> and <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> in the <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
<S%G5023>These<s%> things <S%G1125>write<s%> I to you, <S%G1679>hoping<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to you <S%G5032>shortly:<s%>

But <S%G1437>if<s%> I <S%G1019>tarry<s%> long, that you may <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> you <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G390>behave<s%> yourself in the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> is the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G4769>pillar<s%> and <S%G1477>ground<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

And <S%G3672>without<s%> <S%G3672>controversy<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> is the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G2150>godliness:<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> was <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3700>seen<s%> of <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G2784>preached<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> on in the <S%G2889>world,<s%> <S%G353>received<s%> up <S%G1722>into<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
